title: Anbulla Appa Lyrics Sigaram Thodu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Anbulla Appa
Singer: K.J.Yesudas
Music: D.Imman
Movie: Sigaram Thodu

Anbulla Appa Appa
Yaarumae Unpol Illai Mann Mele
Anbulla Appa Appa
Yaarumae Unpol Illai Mann Mele
Anbulla Appa Appa
Thaayayum Unnil Kandaen Anbaale

Enaku Edhu Thevai Ulagilae
Koduthiduvaai Nee Mudhalile
Vaendaamal Tharum Dheivam
Nee Dhaanae Unmaiyille
Anbulla Appa Appa
Yaarumae Unpol Illai Mann Mele

Maadhakanakkae Thaayum
SumandhuVandhadhu Dhaan Ivanadhu Uyire
Kaalam Muzhukka Ennai Sumandhu
Kaathu Nirkkum unakku Illai Nigare
Thoosi Ennai Thodavum Vida Maatai
Tholil Enai Sumandhu Nadai Pottaai
Vandhaayae Nee En Varamaai

Anbulla Appa Appa

Thozhan Ena NeeTholum Koduthu

Sogam Edhaiyum Unnul maraithu
Punnagaiyae Enakkena Tharuvaai
Kann Imaiyil Ennai Nee Adaikaathu
Thoongidavum marappaai Ennai Paarthu
Vaazhvaayae Nee Enn nizhalaai
